author: Jalal al-Din al-Rumi
title: Born to Soar
content: You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?

author: Adi Shankaracharya
title: I am Shiva
content:
I am neither mind, nor intellect, nor ego, nor the reflections of the inner self (chitta).
I am not the five senses. I am beyond that.
I am not the ether, nor the earth, nor the fire, nor the wind (air).
I am indeed, That eternal knowing and bliss, Shiva, love and pure consciousness.

author: Lao Tzu
title: The Power of Surrender
content: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
